text: Oval tube station in Kennington is a station on the Northern line of the London Underground. It is between Stockwell and Kennington stations. It is the only station on the Morden branch of the Northern line whose name begins with a vowel. Oval station is in Travelcard Zone 2. It is named for The Oval, which it serves. ==References== ==Other websites== * London Transport Museum Photographic Archive ** ** Category:Northern line stations Category:Tube stations in the London Borough of Lambeth Category:London Travelcard zone 2
title: Oval tube station
